name: Marimbla
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Marimbla is a puzzle game where you roll a die across tiles to reach the winning space. The number showing on the top of the die determines how many tiles you can move in a straight line. Use your logic and spatial awareness to determine a correct path!

How to Play:

Roll the die to the diamond to reach the next level. You can move by clicking one of the four ghost dice or using [W][A][S][D]

You can move in a straight line the number of spaces shown on the top face of the die.

Hitting a wall will stop your movement early.

The level will reset if you fall off the edge.

Press [ESC] at any time to quit.

Created by:

Tristan Mansfield (programming, level design)

Alyssa McGaw (music, graphic design, level design)
